title: How to Protect Yourself?
sub: The best way to prevent illness is to avoid being exposed to this virus. As there is not vaccine to prevent so you can protect yourself and help prevent spreading the virus to others if you do as below instruction.

title: Wash your hands frequently
sub: Regularly and thoroughly clean your hands with an alcohol-based hand rub or wash them with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.

title: Maintain social distancing
sub: Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself & anyone who is coughing or sneezing. If you are too close, you get chance to get infected.

title: Avoid touching face
sub: Do not touch your eyes, nose or mouth if your hands are not clean.

title: Practice respiratory hygiene
sub: Make sure you, & the people around you, follow good respiratory hygiene. This means covering your mouth & nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze.
